page.title: 13LIFE AT A VILLAGE SCHOOL.
page.content: We go on visits and find out as much as possible about the theme. We have two plays one at 10:30 and one at 12:15,that lasts until 1:30,then the bell rings and we line up and lead into the hall where we have assembly. In assembly we talk about God,say prayers and sing hymns. In the afternoon we have games such as rounders,running and netball,and the boys play cricket and football.The bell rings for end of school at 3:30, but we don't always get out of school on time because we talk too much. In the evening I go swimming at Dawlish. I do this every week and I'm the youngest in my group but not the slowest.Sometimes after school there are sports practices and matches against other schools.Soon we are to hold our P.T.A. fete raising money for our new school minibus.
